seo_keywords: Dyson Cinetic Big Ball loss of suction

problems.title: Bin Stuck / Won't Empty
problems.description: The red bin runner is jammed and the bottom won't drop.
possible_causes: Fine dust jammed in the runner mechanism
solution_steps: Use compressed air to blow out the runner tracks.
If the plastic rail is snapped, you need a new bin assembly.

problems.title: Turbine Head Not Spinning
problems.description: The floor tool brush bar stopped turning.
solution_steps: Remove the small screws on the head to access the turbine.
Check the main hose for splits.
